segments.text: Morning , Peter . Nice suit ! A new one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . My wife bought it for me yesterday . Hmm , you look nice in that yellow dress . Yellow suits you really well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . Several people have suggested that I get more yellow clothes . They say the color suits me because I have a fair complexion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . You know , pink , green and black could also be good for you . Actually , I think that all colors are okay for a person with your complexion . It's just that different colors can give people different impressions . For example , black could make you look mature , while pink could make you look young and energetic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your compliments . It sounds like you're a clothing expert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , compared with my wife , I'm just a beginner .
segments.speaker: S2
